body:
Release Notes The Network360 Team is excited that this release includes enhancements for Accessibility, Insights, Recruitment, Competitive Dashboard and Compare Networks. The release also includes fixes for Accessibility, Ranked Networks, Insights and My Specifications.

Enhancements

Accessibility
  • Updated the Custom PDF exports for Specialty Summary. When a user selects multiple specialties, it is now separated by ‘OR”.
Insights
  • To avoid confusion in Network 360, the Insights module name has been changed to Custom Reports, along with other insight references in the Module. Insight email inquiries will remain as insights@zelis.com..
Competitive Dashboard
  • A tool tip Icon has been added next to the counts section, which explains the different count types.
Compare Networks
  • A tool tip Icon has been added next to the counts section, which explains the different count types.
Recruitment
  • The initial Recruitment page, labels and descriptions have been updated to reduce confusion for users.
  • "recruit for networks" is now "recruit for target networks”
  • "from networks" is now “from source networks.”
  • Recruit Providers
    • The “recruit for target networks” dropdown defines a list of networks to which you want to add providers.
    • The “from source networks” dropdown defines a list of networks which will be your source providers. The results will include providers associated with these networks.

Fixes

Accessibility
  • Fixed Gateway timeout issue on GAP Map and Top hospitals.
Ranked Networks
  • Other survey participants are no longer able to see what providers another survey participant selected.
Insights
  • Fixed a link for the Insights Marketing page, where users were receiving error messages when trying to access it.
My Specifications
  • When uploading a beneficiaries file OR a population file, .xls files are no longer available to be selected.
  • When trying to upload a population file, the message “The file must contain a column with the “zip’ header” will be displayed.
